document.full_text: the wife of egypt's ousted president was released from detention on tuesday after giving up assets but is still being investigated, said an official leading a probe into whether she amassed wealth illegally.
document.title: wife of mubarak released but still faces probe
lines_and_colors: the wife of egypt's ousted president was released from detention on tuesday after giving up assets but is still being investigated, said an official leading a probe into whether she amassed wealth illegally.
